name: @ai-stats/cpp-sdk
description: AI Stats C++ SDK (preview) - generated client with models wrapper

scripts.smoke:chat: dotenv -e .env.local -- cmd /c "g++ -std=c++17 -I src/gen -o tests/smoke_chat.exe tests/smoke_chat.cpp && tests\\smoke_chat.exe"
scripts.smoke:responses: dotenv -e .env.local -- cmd /c "g++ -std=c++17 -I src/gen -o tests/smoke_responses.exe tests/smoke_responses.cpp && tests\\smoke_responses.exe"
